derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (first used denoting a frill around a sleeve): probably from a variant of rough.
late 16th cent. (originally the name of a card game resembling whist): from Old French rouffle, a parallel formation to Italian ronfa (perhaps an alteration of trionfo 'a trump').

encyclopedia.content: 关于RUFF 国家体育总局中国武术协会与锐武联合巨献“锐武 创始”——中国首个官方批准的MMA赛事。 MMA经历了漫长的发展，其初衷是为了发掘世界上最优秀的搏击选手。搏击选手同场竞技，不受规则限制，在“无限制的框架内”展开较量，常被认为是暴力的血腥运动。然而，MMA从最精湛的武术和搏击招式中开发出了一套独特的技战术而自成一派，成为全世界广为追捧的体育项目，并开始风靡起来。该项运动凝聚了无数艰辛、付出与专注，达到

entry.tran: 飞边（旧时硬的轮状皱领）
entry.def: A ruff is a stiff strip of cloth or other material with many small folds in it, which some people wore round their neck in former times.
A ruff is a thick band of feathers or fur round the neck of a bird or animal.

means.word_mean: 2. common Eurasian sandpiper; male has an erectile ruff in breeding season
3. the act of taking a trick with a trump when unable to follow suit
